feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for various frontend source files to support build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables, dark mode settings, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theming and rendering the control panel screen with notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls, including radio option editing and orientation selection.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Context provider that loads, stores, mutates, and saves control layouts via backend actor calls.
Renders different control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signals or updates state when interacted with, unless in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Provides a button to add new controls, managing edit-mode restrictions, loading state, and an add-control modal.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable positioning logic used in edit mode, updating coordinates during drag operations.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode for the workspace and handles unsupported scenarios with user feedback.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting the current control layout to JSON and importing layouts with error handling.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, including ID, type, binary code, and radio options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit mode and runtime mode with corresponding visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted control signals with timestamps and a manual refresh option.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Displays and manages placement of all controls, enabling selection and dragging in edit mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides context access to control layout state and operations including creation, updates, deletion, and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Provides a hook to manage fullscreen state for a referenced element with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Stores and toggles between 'edit' and 'runtime' panel modes, persisting the value in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events via react-query and polls updates every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation to emit control signals through the actor and refresh recent events on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, fullscreen workspace styling, and custom scrollbars.

frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Returns default configuration objects for different control types used in the control panel.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility to trigger a JSON file download from arbitrary data.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, imports, and exports control panel layout JSON structures with detailed error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider contexts.
Layout for the control panel UI including workspace, inspector, signals panel, and fullscreen/mode controls.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state including existing radio-group-related features, pending feature requests, and metadata for project tracking.
